charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Lance
accompanied by three Dragonite.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_0401_0400: Hahaha! Amazing, right? Does that surprise you?
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_0402_0600: Oh? Are you curious about them?
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_0700: All three of these Dragonite are my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_0800: Just now, I was having all of them train together.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_0900:
While you’re here, how about I give you a little
quiz?
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_1000:
Among these Dragonite is my partner
Pokémon—the one I was partnered with when I
awakened my arc suit.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_1100: Can you tell which one it is?
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_0402_1500: Heh. You’ve still got work to do!
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_1700: Other Trainers may not see a huge difference...
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_1800:
but I can see clearly what sets each one apart
from the others.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_1900: They all worked hard to excel in different areas.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2000: It’s true that dragons are tricky to raise...
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2100:
Not to brag, but I went through a lot to raise them
into the strong, reliable Pokémon they are now.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2200:
I trained the three of them together and kept
challenging really tough Trainers over and
over again!
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2300:
When they were still Dratini and Dragonair, we
lost a fair share of those battles...
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2400:
I also battled Red and Blue with two Dragonair,
when we first met.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2500:
I have different memories of raising each of my
Dragonite—good ones and rough ones.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2600:
We continued to gain experience and grow
together, which brought us to where we are now.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2700:
Because of the way I bonded with these Dragonite
I raised...
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2800: I was able to awaken a new kind of power.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_2900:
That said, I don’t think this is the best we can do
as a sync pair, either.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_3000:
We’ve gained a new power with this arc suit, but
I can’t get complacent...
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_3100: I plan on always aiming higher.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_3200:
It would be the best feeling ever to strengthen my
bonds with my other Dragonite and battle beside
them in my arc suit!
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_3300:
The time you spend with your Pokémon will
become precious memories that will help you
grow as a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_3400:
Don’t forget to cherish your Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0111_90_wataru/2301_1201_3500:
Battle together, worry together, and let your
bond grow!
